content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: Here at Inteli, we have adopted formativeassessmentas a response to the need for a more complete and inclusive model, which allows us to accompany each student formIn Inteli, formative assessment values continuous learning, with personalized feedback and practical projects that enhance student development.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: Evaluating is, by its nature, a challenge. When placed in the context of Inteli'sdisruptive education, everything becomes even more complex. Formative assessment focuses on the student's evolution, highlighting the importance of understanding each student as aunique individual, with their own starting points and destinations.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: I always say that it's a very important tool for understanding that one person's 7 is the same as another's 10.  This allows for a clearer perception of each person's development, making assessment an instrument forvaluingstudents'personal achievementsthroughout their educational journey.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: Our way of doing things
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, assessment goes far beyond simply awarding grades. It is made up of several elements, including theassessment of projects, which are at the heart of ourproject-based learning (PBL) methodology.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: This approach challenges us to deeply understand what the artifact delivered by the student reveals about their learning. Unlike a traditional exam, where the answers are usually binary (right or wrong), the assessment of a project requires a complex and complete understanding of thelearning process.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: The assessment process is intensive for teachers, but extremely rich ineducational insights. We use authoring tools such as Adalove, for submitting work and detailed feedback, and alsoGitHub, for monitoring individual contributions to code projects, allowing both quantitative and qualitative assessment of student work.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: Students are constantly assessed through a combination of group deliveries, self-studies,problem sets, and even traditional exams - which carry less weight, but are important to prepare them for external challenges such as ENADE and selection processes.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: Thiscontinuous evaluation, together with self-assessment processes, fosters the development of self-knowledge and critical thinking skills.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: Implementing formative assessment at Inteli requires ahigh level of commitmentfrom our teachers, who dedicate hours to preparation and feedback. This effort is fundamental to the success of our model, which aims for academic excellence and the maturity and autonomy of our students.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: Our experience has shown that, as the academic community adapts and understands the process better, all thehard workis worth it!
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning

content_blocks.text: Formative assessment at Inteli is aneducational philosophythat empowers our students to becomeprotagonists oftheir own learning journey, preparing them for academic challenges and a life ofcontinuous learningand personal fulfillment.
content_blocks.section: Formative assessment: a model for enhancing student learning
